tasks.task: Plant peanuts in April and May
subtasks: Confirm planting was completed in April and May
Observe peanut flowers blooming above ground
Note development of peanut fruit below ground
Wait for small stems called pegs to reach down from flowers
Confirm harvest time has arrived four months after planting
Collect peanuts from below the soil

tasks.task: Plant peanuts in April and May**
subtasks: Prepare soil for planting (cleared of debris, tilled, etc.)
Confirm planting was done between April and May
Observe peanut flowers blooming above ground
Note development of peanut fruit below ground
Wait for small stems called pegs to reach down from the flowers
Confirm harvest time has arrived four months after planting
Collect peanuts from below the soil
